title: Build Modern Mobile Calendar App with Event Management

requirements.text: Implement a backend event storage system in Motoko with stable storage for events. Each event must include: id (unique identifier), title (text), date (ISO date string), time (time string), description (text), reminder (boolean), and createdAt timestamp. Provide methods to create, read, update, and delete events.

quotes: add, edit, and delete events with title, date, time, description, and reminder notification
The app should store data locally

acceptanceCriteria: Events are stored in stable memory and persist across canister upgrades
All CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) work correctly
Each event includes all required fields: id, title, date, time, description, reminder flag, and createdAt timestamp
Backend returns events sorted by date

requirements.text: Create a Home screen component that displays today's date prominently and lists all events scheduled for today. Include a greeting message and quick stats like total events for the day.

quotes: A beautiful home screen showing today's date and events

acceptanceCriteria: Today's date is displayed in a clear, readable format
All events for today are listed with their time and title
Screen updates in real-time when events are added or modified
Loading states are handled gracefully

requirements.text: Build a monthly calendar view component that displays a full month grid with day numbers. Highlight dates that have events scheduled with visual indicators (dots or badges). Allow users to navigate between months.

quotes: Monthly calendar view with highlighted event dates
view dates in daily, weekly, and monthly formats

acceptanceCriteria: Calendar displays correct days for the current month
Dates with events are visually highlighted
Users can navigate to previous and next months
Clicking a date shows events for that day
Current day is clearly marked

requirements.text: Implement daily and weekly calendar view components. Daily view shows all events for a selected date in chronological order. Weekly view displays a 7-day grid with events positioned by day and time.

quotes: view dates in daily, weekly, and monthly formats

acceptanceCriteria: Daily view lists all events for the selected date
Weekly view shows events across 7 days
Users can switch between daily, weekly, and monthly views
Time slots are clearly labeled in daily and weekly views

requirements.text: Create an Add Event form accessible from a prominent button and the bottom navigation. Form must include fields for title, date (date picker), time (time picker), description (textarea), and reminder toggle. Validate all required fields before submission. Upon successful submission, save the event to the backend and navigate back to the previous view.

quotes: Button to add new events
add, edit, and delete events with title, date, time, description, and reminder notification

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields with appropriate input types
Date and time pickers are mobile-friendly
Required fields show validation errors when empty
Events are successfully saved to the backend
User receives confirmation after successful event creation

requirements.text: Build an Event Details page that displays full event information. Include edit and delete buttons. Edit button opens a pre-filled form allowing users to modify any event field. Delete button shows a confirmation dialog before removing the event from the backend.

quotes: Event details page
add, edit, and delete events

acceptanceCriteria: Event details are displayed clearly with all fields
Edit functionality pre-fills the form with existing data
Changes are saved to the backend successfully
Delete shows confirmation dialog before removal
Deleted events are removed from all views

requirements.text: Implement a reminder notification system that displays browser notifications for events with reminders enabled. Check for upcoming events (within 15 minutes) and show notifications with event title and time. Request notification permissions from the user on first use.

quotes: Reminder notification system
reminder notification

acceptanceCriteria: Browser notification permission is requested appropriately
Notifications appear for events with reminders enabled
Notifications show event title and time
Notifications appear at an appropriate time before the event (e.g., 15 minutes)
System handles permission denial gracefully

requirements.text: Implement dark mode and light mode support with a toggle in the Settings screen. Store the user's theme preference in local storage and apply it consistently across all screens. Use appropriate color schemes for both modes with blue, white, and purple accents.

quotes: Dark mode and light mode support
Use modern colors like blue, white, and purple

acceptanceCriteria: Toggle switch in Settings changes between dark and light mode
Theme preference persists across sessions
All components adapt to the selected theme
Text remains readable in both modes
Blue, white, and purple colors are used appropriately in both themes

requirements.text: Create a bottom navigation bar with four tabs: Home, Calendar, Add Event, and Settings. Each tab should have an icon and label. Active tab is visually highlighted. Tapping a tab navigates to the corresponding screen with smooth transitions.

quotes: Include bottom navigation with tabs: Home, Calendar, Add Event, Settings

acceptanceCriteria: Bottom navigation is fixed at the bottom of the screen
All four tabs are present with icons and labels
Active tab is visually distinct
Tapping tabs navigates to the correct screen
Navigation is smooth and responsive

requirements.text: Create a Settings screen with options for theme toggle (dark/light mode), notification preferences, and a placeholder section for future cloud sync settings. Include app version information and a clean, organized layout.

quotes: Include bottom navigation with tabs: Home, Calendar, Add Event, Settings
allow future cloud sync support

acceptanceCriteria: Settings screen is accessible from bottom navigation
Theme toggle is present and functional
Notification preferences can be managed
Cloud sync section is present but marked as coming soon
Layout is clean and organized

requirements.text: Apply smooth animations throughout the app including page transitions, modal appearances, button interactions, and calendar view changes. Use Tailwind CSS transition utilities and ensure animations are performant on mobile devices.

quotes: Smooth animations and modern UI design

acceptanceCriteria: Page transitions are smooth and visually appealing
Modals and dialogs animate in and out gracefully
Button interactions have visual feedback
Calendar view changes are animated smoothly
Animations perform well on mobile devices without lag

requirements.text: Ensure the entire application is mobile responsive with a design optimized for Android devices. Use responsive breakpoints, touch-friendly tap targets (minimum 44x44px), and mobile-appropriate font sizes. Test all interactions for mobile usability.

quotes: Mobile responsive design (Android friendly)
Create a modern mobile Calendar App

acceptanceCriteria: App layout adapts to different screen sizes
All interactive elements are easily tappable on mobile
Font sizes are readable on mobile devices
No horizontal scrolling is required
App functions correctly on Android browsers

requirements.text: Style the application with a minimal, professional design using Tailwind CSS. Use a color palette of blue, white, and purple throughout the app. Apply consistent spacing, typography, and component styling. Ensure the design is clean, modern, and easy to use.

quotes: Use modern colors like blue, white, and purple
Make the design minimal, professional, and easy to use
modern UI design

acceptanceCriteria: Blue, white, and purple colors are used consistently
Design is minimal without unnecessary visual clutter
Typography is professional and readable
Spacing is consistent throughout the app
Overall aesthetic is modern and polished

constraints: Use React with TypeScript for frontend development
Use Motoko for backend development on Internet Computer
Support mobile devices with responsive design
Use blue, white, and purple as primary colors
Data must persist across canister upgrades using stable storage
nonGoals: Cloud sync implementation (placeholder only for future)
Integration with external calendar services (Google Calendar, Outlook)

required: Calendar app icon with modern blue and purple gradient design (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
Home screen illustration showing calendar and events in minimalist style with blue and purple accents (home-illustration.dim_800x600.png)
